Params[3]: This is... an additional exercise for the training...
Apart from combat and tactics... I thought of a way to assist you in your daily life, Commandant.
So I thought I'd give it a try.
I can wake you up every morning and prepare breakfast for you.
I can prepare tea, coffee, or cute little cakes for you during your free time.
I can even prepare your bed for you before you go to bed at night.
Like a fam... or a maid.

Params[2]: Isn't that too luxurious for the lives we have right now?
Params[4]: I don't think Constructs are needed for these kinds of work.

Params[3]: I'm preparing for the inevitable future...
It's something I want to do.
I believe that with you and everyone, we will reclaim Earth one day...
And when we find each other on the surface, we would still be the commandant's Gray Ravens, right?

Params[4]: As long as our squad isn't disbanded.

Params[3]: Like, the way we greet each other when me meet...

Params[4]: You really don't have to call me "master."

Params[3]: I'm actually quite embarrassed as well... How about I call you something else?
Is that so? I thought you would enjoy being called that... In that case—
